## \_getWithRelations() function

Get model with specified relationships set on model according to model property config set in [ModelStateConfig](./state-model.modelstateconfig.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getWithRelations<TModel extends {}, TState extends {}>(state: Maybe<Immutable<Partial<TState>>>, cfg: RelationInclude<TState>, id: unknown): Maybe<Immutable<TModel>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;Partial&lt;TState&gt;&gt;&gt; | State containing model and relationship data |
|  cfg | [RelationInclude](./state-model.relationinclude.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState&gt; | Configuration of which relationships to include |
|  id | unknown | A unique property value of the model that is requested. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;TModel&gt;&gt;

The requested model with relationships applied if found.
